oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Breakfast At The Opry - 1953-04-04 - Part 2 [date unconfirmed]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Broadcast of WSM's Breakfast At The Opry, part 2 - likely 1953-04-04 (unconfirmed) based on Hank Snow and Ernest Tubb returning from Korea on 1953-04-02. Personnel include Dave Overton (announcer), Eddie Hill (host), Hank Snow (performer), Buford Gentry (performer with Hank Snow), Tommy Vaden (performer with Hank Snow), James 'Sleepy' McDaniels (performer with Hank Snow), Chet Atkins (guest), and Ken Marvin (guest). Held at the Noel Hotel, Nashville, TN. Sponsored by Rock City. Names of audience members are unconfirmed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Hill; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Eddie Hill introduces audience member Mrs C. S. Fontalou to Chet Atkins -- Chet Atkins and Eddie Hill talk -- Eddie Hill and Mrs C. S. Fontalou talk -- I Want A Girl (Just Like The Girl That Married Dear Old Dad) (Eddie Hill, audience) -- Dave Overton talks about the program -- Dave Overton introduces audience member Carol Cooke -- Eddie Hill, Carol Cooke and George Cooke talk -- Dave Overton introduces audience member Lewis B. Harris -- Eddie Hill and Lewis B. Harris talk -- Eddie Hill introduces Lewis B. Harris to Ken Marvin -- Ken Marvin talks -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill to audience member Mrs J. Harper -- Eddie Hill talks to Mrs J. Harper -- Eddie Hill introduces Hank Snow -- (Now And Then There's) A Fool Such As I (Hank Snow) -- Dave Overton announces the competition winner -- Eddie Hill talks to Mrs C. S. Fontalou -- Eddie Hill talks to various audience members -- Closing statement (Eddie Hill) -- Closing statement (Dave Overton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Breakfast at the opry (Radio program); Overton, Dave; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Snow, Hank; Atkins, Chet; Marvin, Ken; Gentry, Buford; Vaden, Tommy; McDaniels, James Sleepy
